sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { withRouter ,useLocation} from 'react-router-dom'; import { InputText } from 'primereact/inputtext'; import Jumbotron from 'react-bootstrap/Jumbotron'; function Show(props) { const location = useLocation(); const data=location.task.taskview; return (

Task View

















Name:

{data.name}

Task Description:

{data.description}

Task status:

{data.status}

Task Assign Date:

{data.assign_date.replace(/T.*/,'').split('-').reverse().join('-')}

Task Deadline Date:

{data.deadline.replace(/T.*/,'').split('-').reverse().join('-')}

Assigned Employee name:

{data.taskdetails[0].name}

Emplyoee Department:

{data.taskdetails[0].department}

Employee Designation:

{data.taskdetails[0].designation}
); }; export default withRouter(Show);
